New Records: Arshdeep Singh set an unwanted record by bowling the most number of no-balls by an Indian bowler in a T20I series.
Arshdeep Singh became the first Indian bowler to bowl 3 no-balls on the trot in a T20I.
Arshdeep Singh became the first Indian bowler to bowl 3 no-balls in an over in T20Is.
Key Match Events: Arshdeep Singh bowled 3 successive no-balls in his first over in the 2nd T20I in Pune.
Sri Lanka scored 55 without losing a wicket in the powerplay.
